What is a "TS"?

TS means telesynced it means the audio was recorded from the cinemas wireless speaker system or sound jack for the hearing impaired or even sometimes from the projection booth via the original source and added afterwards to the camera recorded video file so you dont hear laughing etc

Exactly right! This is a place to respond to people anonymously without the fear of physical retaliation. Isn't the internet great. I can call you an asshole and you can do the same thing in relative safety. Freedom of speech is great isn't it? Honestly i don't want to make anyone here so upset that they go postal, i just love to debate and i do it constantly with people i know personally. The problem with reading text is that you can not always accurately understand the tone intended in it.  Making it difficult to understand the persons mood. Everyone on earth has an opinion about something and this is the one place they can voice it safely, but of course with opinions comes critics. They are one in the same like peanut butter and jelly. I really meant no true insult to you or anyone else, but every action inevitably has a reaction, so feel free to react to this.
